question: Which Amazon EC2 pricing option provides a discount when you specify a number of EC2 instances to run a specific OS, instance family and size, and tenancy in one Region?
Which Amazon EC2 pricing option provides a discount when you make an hourly spend commitment to an instance family and Region for a 1-year or 3-year term?
Which Amazon EC2 instance type is suitable for data warehousing applications?
Which Amazon EC2 instance type balances compute, memory, and networking resources?
Which Amazon EC2 instance type is ideal for high-performance databases?
Which Amazon EC2 instance type offers high-performance processors?
You ONLY want to manage Applications and Data. Which type of Cloud Computing model should you use?
What is the pricing model of Cloud Computing?
Which Global Infrastructure identity is composed of one or more discrete data centers with redundant power, networking, and connectivity, and are used to deploy infrastructure?
Which of the following is NOT one of the Five Characteristics of Cloud Computing?
options: Dedicated Support Agent to help you deploy applications
correctAnswer: Dedicated Support Agent to help you deploy applications

question: Which of the following services has a global scope?
Which are the 3 pricing fundamentals of the AWS Cloud?
options: Compute, Storage, and Data transfer in the AWS Cloud
Compute, Networking, and Data transfer out of the AWS Cloud
Compute, Storage, and Data transfer out of the AWS Cloud
Storage, Functions, and Data transfer in the AWS Cloud
correctAnswer: Compute, Storage, and Data transfer in the AWS Cloud

question: Which of the following options is NOT a point of consideration when choosing an AWS Region?
AWS Regions are composed of?
options: One or more discrete data centers

question: Which of the following is NOT an advantage of Cloud Computing?
options: Trade capital expense (CAPEX) for operational expense (OPEX)
Stop spending money running and maintaining data centers

question: Which of the following is the definition of Cloud Computing?
options: Rapidly develop, test and launch software applications
Automatic and quick ability to acquire resources as you need them and release resources when you no longer need them
On-demand availability of computer system resources, especially data storage (cloud storage) and computing power, without direct active management by the user
correctAnswer: On-demand availability of computer system resources, especially data storage (cloud storage) and computing power, without direct active management by the user

question: What defines the distribution of responsibilities for security in the AWS Cloud?
